text: MeidasTouch Pops on Podcast Charts as Progressives Search for Answers The company is a leader among numerous digital-first outlets that have been reshaping the progressive media landscape since President Trump took office. A Political Reporter Takes Her Scoops to YouTube Most online political media stars traffic in highly partisan viewpoints. Tara Palmeri hopes that playing it straight will pay off. A Chill Sets In for Undocumented Workers, and Those Who Hire Them Fearing roundups, many immigrants are staying home. Construction, agriculture, senior care and hospitality employers say labor shortages will worsen.
